00048 /*****************************************************************************\
00049  *      File:   mdes2.c
00050  *      Author: John C. Gyllenhaal, Wen-mei Hwu
00051  *      Creation Date:  April 1996
00052 \*****************************************************************************/
00053 
00054 
00055 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00056 #include <config.h>
00057 #include <stdio.h>
00058 #include <strings.h>
00059 #include <Lcode/l_main.h>
00060 #include <library/l_alloc_new.h>
00061 #include <library/i_error.h>
00062 #include "lmdes.h"
00063 #include "mdes2.h"
00064 
00065 static L_Alloc_Pool *Mdes2_pool = NULL;
00066 
00067 
00068 
00069 Mdes2 *
00070 load_mdes2 (char *file_name)
00071 {
00072   Mdes2 *mdes2;
00073   FILE *in;
00074   int name_len;
00075 
00076   /* For now, make sure ends with .lmdes2 */
00077   name_len = strlen (file_name);
00078   if ((name_len < 7) ||
00079       (file_name[name_len - 7] != '.') ||
00080       (file_name[name_len - 6] != 'l') ||
00081       (file_name[name_len - 5] != 'm') ||
00082       (file_name[name_len - 4] != 'd') ||
00083       (file_name[name_len - 3] != 'e') ||
00084       (file_name[name_len - 2] != 's') || (file_name[name_len - 1] != '2'))
00085     {
00086       I_punt ("load_mdes2: '%s' must currently end with .lmdes2", file_name);
00087     }
00088 
00089   /* Open the file for reading */
00090   if ((in = fopen (file_name, "r")) == NULL)
00091     {
00092       I_punt ("load_mdes2: Unable to open mdes2 file '%s' for reading.",
00093               file_name);
00094     }
00095 
00096   /* Initialize mdes2 alloc pool if necessary */
00097   if (Mdes2_pool == NULL)
00098     Mdes2_pool = L_create_alloc_pool ("Mdes2", sizeof (Mdes2), 1);
00099 
00100   /* Allocate the mdes2 structure */
00101   mdes2 = (Mdes2 *) L_alloc (Mdes2_pool);
00102 
00103   /* Get a copy of the file name */
00104   mdes2->file_name = strdup (file_name);
00105 
00106   /* Read the md version of the machine description */
00107   mdes2->md_mdes = MD_read_md (in, file_name);
00108   fclose (in);
00109 
00110   mdes2->version1_mdes = NULL;
00111 
00112   /* Create the schedule manager version of the mdes */
00113   mdes2->sm_mdes = SM_build_mdes (mdes2);
00114 
00115   /* Return the newly created mdes2 structure */
00116   return (mdes2);
00117 }
